text: Kamaghɨn amizɨ, Pol tagha ghua gumazir kaba ini. Egha amɨmzaraghan, me ghua arazir Godɨn damazimɨn zueghamim, a me ko a gamigha, Godɨn Dɨpenir mɨriamɨn aven ghua ofa gamir gumazibav gɨa ghaze, dughiar manamɨn e Godɨn damazimɨn zueghamin arazimɨn dughiam gɨvaghtɨ, me e bagh vaghvagh ofa damuam.
